tileset = "temple_FIRE";
area = "Temple_FIRE_SW";
areaname = "Fire Temple";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "FireTemple";
A_sprites = [{name:"Gold Keystone",model:"object",x:3,y:17,type:"switch_orb",colour:"topaz",base:"gold",conv_action:1},{name:"Gold Gate",model:"object",x:8,y:13,type:"switch_gate",colour:"topaz"},{name:"Soul Cage",model:"examine",x:8,y:6,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_flamesouls"},{name:"EXIT",model:"DOOR12",x:34,y:2,dir:"s",dest:["Temple_FIRE_hub",1,12]}];
var _doneThis = false;
var d = 0;
while(d < GameData.plotVars.FireTempleTest.DONE.length)
{
   if(GameData.plotVars.FireTempleTest.DONE[d] == area)
   {
      _doneThis = true;
   }
   d++;
}
if(GameData.plotVars.SAVIOURS_CH3 === 1 && !_doneThis)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Bartholio",model:"bartholio",x:8 + (!TempVars.BartSW001?0:1),y:7,walkspeed:-1,dir:(!TempVars.BartSW001?"n":"w"),elem:"LIGHT",conv:"c_Saviours"});
}
areaLoot = [{x:16,y:4,amount:1,item:"PhoenixDown"},{x:26,y:25,amount:1,item:"M Runestone"},{x:2,y:30,amount:1,item:"Ether"}];

btlChance = 3;
minSteps = 5;
levelrange = MONSTER_LEVELS.FIRE_TEMPLE;
musicTrack = "FireTemple";
DeadTempleCheck();
AreaSetup({WARP:1});
EN_ADD("Places","Fire Temple");
